mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOLUNTEER ( VOLUN_NO, VT_BS_NAME, VT_TITLE, VT_PLACE, VT_RECRUIT_START, VT_RECRUIT_END, VT_WORK_START, VT_WORK_END, VT_ING, VT_NAME, VT_USER_PHONE, VT_USER_EMAIL, BS_NO, USER_NO) VALUES (volun_PJ_SEQ.nextval,#{vt_bs_name},#{vt_title},#{vt_place}, '2022-05-28','2022-05-29','2022-06-08','2022-06-09', 1,#{vt_name},#{vt_user_phone},#{vt_user_email},#{bs_no},#{user_no})
